title: Let Go
message: It’s hard to turn the page when you know someone won’t be in the next chapter, but the story must go on.

title: Let Go
message: Pain makes you stronger, tears make you braver, and heartbreak makes you wiser

title: Pain of heartbreak
message: The shattering of your heart when it breaks is the noise your soul makes to remind you of its strength.

title: Keep your head up high
message: Don’t cry when the sun is gone because the tears won’t let you see the stars.

title: Be Hopeful
message: One day, someone will come into your life and make you see why it didn’t work out with anyone else.
